# Paper Wars: Cannon Fodder

iOSMarch 22, 2011WiiDecember 8, 2011SwitchMarch 1, 2018

}}
Paper Wars: Cannon Fodder is a tower defense video game developed and published by iFun4all for PlayStation Portable and PlayStation 3 in 2010â€“2011, for iOS and Wii in 2011, and for Nintendo Switch (under the name Paper Wars: Cannon Fodder Devastated) in 2018.
Reception
(PSP) 63/100(Wii) 60/100(NS1) 46/100(NS2) 40/100

}}
The iOS, PSP, and Wii versions received "mixed or average reviews", while the Switch version received "generally unfavorable reviews", according to the review aggregation website Metacritic.
